INTRO.CATCHPHRASE: Support in your child's journey from egg to first flight

DESCRIPTION.PARAGRAPH: During their first years of life, infants develop physically, emotionally and cognitively at an amazing speed.
These early acquisitions lay the foundation for later academic, personal and professional achievements.
BabyCloud helps your family and your child, to make the most of this critical developmental period.

Gazouyi encourages meaningful interactions between you and your child. We empower you to gather, interact and connect with your child's unique developmental journey, while reassuring you every step of the way.
We have designed BabyCloud to use the highest cyber security standards available proposed by the biggest institutions in the world (CNIL, MIT, American army) to protect your privacy.
Our security system is regularly tested by third parties to insure and protect your privacy.

IMG.ALT: logo centre national de la recherche scientifique
logo école des hautes études en sciences sociales
logo Institut national de recherche en informatique et en automatique

DESCRIPTION.PARAGRAPH: Parents, you have the opportunity to take part in our scientific research to establish pioneering quantitative standards and predictive models!

Your contribution helps BabyCloud develop tools for early diagnosis of speech delays as well as more efficient intervention programs. These programs will help many children impacted by language or cognitive disorders worldwide.

MEMBERS.NAME: Dr. Emmanuel Dupoux
MEMBERS.DESCRIPTION: Creator of Babycloud & Speech Technology specialist

MEMBERS.NAME: Dr. Alejandrina Cristia
MEMBERS.DESCRIPTION: CNRS researcher & Child Language Development specialist

MEMBERS.NAME: Anne Billot
MEMBERS.DESCRIPTION: Speech Therapist with expertise in cognitive and linguistic remediation.

STEPS.NAME: Start with the Logger
STEPS.DESCRIPTION: Capture your family’s interactions throughout the day and to document the input your child is receiving during their language acquisition stage.

STEPS.NAME: Recharge with the Dock
STEPS.DESCRIPTION: While the logger charges, the dock transfers the recordings to the secure cloud for analysis. Don’t worry, the process is totally secure and encrypted.

STEPS.NAME: Analyze with the Baby SmartBox
STEPS.DESCRIPTION: Our existing pipeline (source separation, voice activity detection, speaker diarization) will extract, segment and label stretches of data with communicative activity.

STEPS.NAME: Get informed with the Explorer
STEPS.DESCRIPTION: Parents have access to metadata and developmental analytics (child’s first words, language milestones, linguistic and social interactions clips and analyses).

STEPS.NAME: Get involved in “Citizen Science”
STEPS.DESCRIPTION: Ultimately, your contribution will help many children impacted by language or cognitive disorders worldwide.

OUTLINE.MAIN_POINT: Purpose of the terms of use

DESCRIPTION.PARAGRAPH: The terms of use are intended to govern the use of the site by any user. By browsing the website you acknowledge to having fully read and understood the terms of use.
Site: refers to the website www.babycloudlab.com
Babycloud project: refers to the scientific project carried out by the Cognitive Science and Psycholinguistics Laboratory (LSCP) of the Ecole Normale Supérieure (ENS).
General Regulation on the Protection of Personal Data (GDPR): refers to the European legislation in effect since May 25th, 2018 regarding the protection of personal data.
Internet user: refers to any user who visits the site.
Subscriber: refers to a user who registers his or her email address on the site and receives the BabyCloud’s newsletter.

Processing: refers to any operation or set of operations performed on personal data or on sets of personal data, whether or not by automated means, such as the collection, recording, storage, use, dissemination or otherwise making available, alignment or combination, restriction, erasure or destruction.
Access to the website babycloudlab.com is available to any user who has an internet connection.
Purpose of information processing: Information processing involves the subscription to the BabyCloud’s newsletter. The newsletter will inform subscribers on the progress of the project.
Data processed: The processed data is solely the email addresses of the users who subscribed to the BabyCloud email list. No IP address will be saved. No commercial cookies are used on this website.
Persons concerned: The data collection only applies to users who wish to subscribe to the BabyCloud email list.
Destination of the processed data: The processed data will be used by the Babycloud team solely to send the newsletter. None of the user’s data will be transferred outside the European Union.

Data retention period: BabyCloud keeps the email addresses of its subscribers for a period of 3 years. At the end of this period, they will be asked whether they wish to remain subscribed to the site. They can unsubscribe at any time via the “unsubscribe” link embedded in each email they receive.
User’s rights: Users may access, obtain a copy, object to the processing, and/or request change or removal of their data. They also have the right to restrict their data collection.
You can exercise your rights by contacting the DPO at dpo@babycloudlab.com.
www.babycloudlab.com is a reserved domain name. Any unauthorized use of the copyrighted material is punishable by criminal and civil penalties.
No provision of the terms of use may be interpreted as an assignment of intellectual property rights.

BabyCloud ensures the proper functioning of the site. However, we will not be liable for any loss resulting the user’s browsing activity including service disruption, hacking issues or computer viruses.
These terms of use are governed by French law and the parties agree to submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the French courts.

OUTLINE.MAIN_POINT: Changes to the terms of use

DESCRIPTION.PARAGRAPH: BabyCloud reserves the right to update the terms of use in order to take into account, any legal and/or technical changes without the user’s consent. Any revised terms of use will be applicable at the time of its posting on the BabyCloud website.
